title: [Bug #19] When user update line up info, Admin user line up info does not get updated unless refresh page
body:
### From Trello (lynked-insight)

  Steps:
User A performed line up.
Admin check user A line up info
User A updated the line up info
Admin check user A line up info without refresh page
Observe

Expected result:
It should auto update user A line up info without refreshing page

Actual result:
It still display old line up info for user A
